column4: Hello. the link https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/switching/installing-partitioning.html does not help me much with partitioning manually with the shell. Can anyone help me to print an overview of the partitions on my system?
Please
ok you want help partitining your hard disk to install Ubuntu?
ok you don't need to partition your hard disk using commands to install Ubuntu
you can partition your hard disk graphicalley
ok you want to see your partitions
you can install gparted into your install and see the partitions like that, or   something else
your trying to install?
gparted will show the partitions.  and  mnt and media will show them in the file system
